page.title: 17Witton-le-Wear School
page.content: {22 Aug.1916.}There were 150 pupils and 4 teachers. {15 Jan.1917.}40 children absent due to severe snow storm. {9 Dec.1917.}Mrs. Heslop (teacher) attended funeral of Mary Heslop (aged 8). {11 Nov.1918.}School timetable suspended due to Armistice Day. {1 Jul.1925.}10 cases of measles in school. {13 Dec.1926.}Mr.S.W.Tims started as headteacher. {21 Jan.1935.}Miss.E.Nattrass taken to hospital with Scarlet fever. {31 Jan.1935.}Two children with malnutrition put on a special diet by school doctor,Dr.Buchanan. {6 Feb.1935.}Headteacher paid 3 Shillings for scissor sharpening. {12 Jun.1935.}School repainted.
